  * Indentation in Java code should be four spaces and there should be no tabs.
  * Indentation in Ruby code should be four spaces and there should be no tabs.
  * Indentation in Smalltalk code should one tab.
  * Acronyms should be all uppercase, even when used in camel-cased names.
  * Lines shouldn't extend past 80 columns in most cases. This makes it easier to get non-wrapping code printouts.
  * Methods should appear in alphabetical order within their class.
